h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Wind Tamer Location
content: The Wind Tamer can be found upon defeating Fuban in Secret: Kingdom of Sahali area in Yellow Wind Ridge. This will require you to complete the full Boar-Man questline, which we have a guide on here. This quest will require you to obtain the Sobering Stone, Jade Lotus"), and Arhat Gold Piece from Yellow Sand Formation \- Windrest Bridge area in Yellow Wind Ridge.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Wind_Tamer.md', within the main section titled 'Wind Tamer', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Wind Tamer Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Wind Tamer can be found upon defeating Fuban in Secret: Kingdom of Sahali area in Yellow Wind Ridge. This will require you to complete the full Boar-Man questline, which we have a guide on here. This quest will require you to obtain the Sobering Stone, Jade Lotus"), and Arhat Gold Piece from Yellow Sand Formation \- Windrest Bridge area in Yellow Wind Ridge.
